abstract: A young Iranian woman's sense of isolation and alienation in a foreign land
description: A docudrama about a young woman from Iran who finds herself culturally alienated with the Australian way of life. Through her poetic narration she expresses her sense of isolation and loss of identity in this strange and different land. In Farsi with English subtitles.
